name: Firewall (The Gateless Gate)
description: The Gateless Gate is a collection of Buddhist koans meant to highlight how the senses and polarities of consciousness (represented as binary numbers) create an invisible, self-imposed barrier to enlightenment and true spiritual freedom. It is also worth noting its value as a critical piece against gatekeeping, in solidarity to those who have been kept away from the benefits of society through little fault of their own.
